info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 03 at 1:25PM CDT until August 03 at 2:00PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: The National Weather Service in Chicago has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Lake County in northeastern Illinois... North central Cook County in northeastern Illinois... * Until 200 PM CDT. * At 124 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Long Grove, or over Buffalo Grove, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Waukegan, Arlington Heights, Evanston, Palatine, Des Plaines, Mount Prospect, Glenview, Buffalo Grove, Wheeling, Northbrook, North Chicago, Mundelein, Highland Park, Wilmette, Vernon Hills, Libertyville, Lake Zurich, Lake Forest, Rolling Meadows and Deerfield. This includes... Great Lakes Naval Training Center, Lake Forest College, and Ravinia Music Festival. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
